title: 8 incredible travel destinations inspired by adventure novels
text:
8 incredible travel destinations insp... 8 incredible travel destinations inspired by adventure novels Next Story Prev Story 9 min ago Read more: Mashable 
An engaged reader is one whose mind wanders to faraway lands when turning a page. An inspired reader is one whose life changes after shutting the book.   Mashable.
